id

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

User.views module

User.views.dec_img(path, key)

Decrypts an encrypted document by performing XOR using the private key of the User

Parameters

  • path – path to encrypted image (document)

  • key – private key of User

Returns

decrypted image (document)

User.views.download(request)

Downloads the decrypted document of an User

Parameters

request – The request object used to generate this HttpResponse

Returns

decrypted image download response

User.views.granted(request)

Loads the list of Institute or Company who have been granted view-request and gives facility to User to remove the request either temporarily or permanently

Parameters

request – The request object used to generate this response

Returns

HttpResponse object with the granted view-requests navbar open

User.views.home(request)

Loads the User home-page template

Parameters

request – The request object used to generate this response

Returns

HttpResponse object with the User homepage

User.views.index(request)

Loads the User index-page template

Parameters

request – The request object used to generate this response

Returns

HttpResponse object with the User indexpage

User.views.logout(request)

Logs out User from app

Parameters

request – The request object used to generate this response

Returns

Redirect to log-in page

User.views.pending(request)

Loads the pending view-request from Institute or Company and gives facility to User to either accept or reject the requests

Parameters

request – The request object used to generate this response

Returns

HttpResponse object with the pending-requests navbar open

User.views.private(request)

Asks for private key of user

Parameters

request – The request object used to generate this response

Returns

HttpResponse object with the enter private key page

User.views.request(request)

Loads a webpage that can be used by User to request Institute or Company for some documents

Parameters

request – The request object used to generate this response

Returns

HttpResponse object with the request Certificate navbar open

User.views.send_mail(imail, msg)

Sends an email from a User to the Company or Institute whom User requests for a certificate.

Parameters

  • imail – email of Institute or Company that receives the request

  • msg – msg to be sent in email

Returns

None
